resources.string: You have already owned this item

This is because Play Store does not provide the correct purchase information, causing the app to mistakenly believe that it has not been purchased. Usually clearing the Play Store data and force stop the app will work.\nAlso, if you\'re signed in to multiple Google accounts, try reinstalling with the account you purchased.
Error when interacting with Play Store

There may be a variety of reasons, but we know some of the possible reasons that usually limit the permissions of the Play Store. For example, the MIUI China version needs to ensure that the Play Store\'s "display interface in the backgroundâ€œ permission is granted. Please check if there is a similar situation.

There are several possibilities: 
1. Play Store is not installed correctly.
2. The account area does not support purchase (such as the mainland China region).
3. The connection between the app and the Play Store is blocked (such as the background limit feature).
4. Use cheating apps like "Lucky Patcher".
